Title: Accessibility of TRE's services and administrative processes (previously service design)
Description: Service design is needed to create easy access to services of the TRE for end-users in different roles. Also the workflow required to share and analyse data should be made as easy as possible.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example:
Workflow diagram for TREs services access

Design diagram to analyze access control
Service catalogue describing TRE services and administrative processes
User journey or workflow diagram for data access and analysis
